system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision tree item. GTK+ implementation." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2009-06-10 22:52:23 -0700 (Wed, 10 Jun 2009) $" revision: "$Revision: 79207 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_tree_item_imp.xmlEV_TREE_ITEM_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_tree_item_i.xmlEV_TREE_ITEM_I undefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_tree_node_imp.xml#f_reset_pebble_functionreset_pebble_function redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_tree_item_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_gtk/ev_tree_node_imp.xmlEV_TREE_NODE_IMP redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_tree_item_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_tree_node_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_tree_item_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_tree_item.xmlEV_TREE_ITEM note option: stable attribute end
